extendedInfo.description: Stopwatch, Timer & Chess Clock in one app. Funny and flexible!Ideal for every timing situation (sports, games, work, cooking, sleep).Also a full-window clock with many possible customizations and 29 presets. Just swipe the main window to change the preset (left/right) and configure details later.Available in English.Features:- Full-window clock with 29 presets.- Stopwatch and timer with 99 hours.- Chess clock with Fischer and Bronstein delays implemented.- Graphical widget for a quick look and fast access to tools.General:- Very flexible. It works in landscape, but also in portrait position, with different layouts to best fit the space.- Very configurable: colors, fonts, date position, backgrounds, etc.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Had a difficult time finding this  app. Only one so far I could find which allowed me to open email while clock is running. Perfect!
reviews.author: Larry Dh
